snippet.title: Memory Shards Trailer
snippet.description:
PLAY NOW ON STEAM!
https://bit.ly/memory-shards

Live the story of Jake, a man stuck in the past as he finds out a way to understand it by playing an old JRPG from his childhood. This is a small introspective drama story.

This is the teaser for Memory Shards, releasing on Steam in the next days.

JOIN OUR DISCORD:
https://discord.gg/KWQXYwKYMg

SOCIAL MEDIA:
https://twitter.com/cupidisland
https://instagram.com/cupidisland
